meanings.sent1: The directrice of the school made sure everyone followed the rules.
meanings.sent2: The directrice of the company was known for her strong leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The directrice of the dance class showed off her moves while leading the group.
meanings.sent4: As the directrice of the orchestra, she conducted the musicians with grace and precision.
meanings.sent5: The directrice of the team guided them to victory with her strategic planning.

meanings.definition: A woman in charge of an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The directrice of the charity organized a successful fundraiser.
meanings.sent2: She was appointed as the directrice of the committee due to her organizational skills.
meanings.sent3: The directrice of the book club always picked the most interesting reads.
meanings.sent4: In her role as directrice of the project, she ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The directrice of the choir harmonized the voices beautifully during performances.
